column6: Description(synopsis)
This horror movie is driven by mystery and suspense. After being in an accident, a woman wakes up to find herself in a bunker with a man who claims to have saved her life. 2016
A charming and hilarious animation. After losing his ninth life, a pampered and selfish cat is offered a chance to make amends with nine new lives as a different creature each time.
A lady's husband does not satisfy her in bed, she tried all she could to get back to her ex. Little did she know that he was in love with her best friend.
A bright student from a humble background wins a scholarship when Madam Sonia notices him. Unknown to him she runs a "firm" that provides services to rich business women.
A visually-gripping, Oscar-winning, Sam Mendes WWI film. Two soldiers are sent on a mission behind enemy lines to prevent the death of 1,600 men who are walking into a deadly trap.
When the remains of an apartheid-era policeman are discovered 60 years after he went missing, a retired singer revisits her past to help with the investigation.
Paul Walker and Tyrese Gibson join forces to bring a Miami drug lord to justice in the first sequel to the Hollywood thrill ride. Expect hot cars and plenty of action.
Chief prepares and plans his daughter Janice into a family just for his own gains, but the worst hits and tables turn as love intercepts his plans.
Sean Penn, Benicio Del Toro and Naomi Watts deliver compelling performances in this moving, powerful drama that tells the story of three lives brought together by tragedy.
A woman of God is sent to a far land to preach the gospel, but the powers that be will not allow her work to come alive.
Terry is heartbroken and lashes out at everyone around her. She realizes that happiness doesn't come from having a husband, family or any other societal expectations.
A father instructs his four children to pray at 2:00 AM every day to connect with themselves and the divine until the day Mr. William fails to uphold the ritual.
Beulah, in a race against time to save her brother's life, finds herself compelled to yield to Rex's advances, a choice that would haunt her in the days to come.
A gripping WWII action film inspired by a true story. A group of Marines must defend their airfield in Malay against the Japanese for three days. 2023
An intriguing South African drama that tells the story of a group of adult siblings who are forced to return to their childhood home after the death of their father.
After a lady shows up on her friends birthday and showers him with love, he eventually ends up with a village herbalist girl.
Detective Shola knows it will be a career-high to finally pin down the ruthless drug lord, but she's tested by her absentee husband's closest friend who seeks refuge in her home.
A young bachelor is set on a mission to find his missing rib. The journey unravels the true color of his missing rib.
East meets West in this epic Asian fantasy film. Matrix star Keanu Reeves leads a group of 47 warriors into battle against deadly mystical forces. 2013
Love is fleeting in this charming romcom with Adam Sandler and Drew Barrymore. A man meets his dream girl, but she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the very next day.
A thrilling action film starring Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman. When a tech blogger finds a time-altering ring, he uses it to exact revenge on an evil pharmaceutical company. 2023
Oga Joe the landlord lost his wife a long time ago, now he is in love with a tenant who is about to shatter his heart.
A charming COVID dramedy. Set up on a pre-arranged date by their old-fashioned Indian parents, a mismatched Ravi and Rita quarantine together as COVID-19 intensifies. 2021
A man gets married to his wife only to maltreat her, little did he know that he is making the biggest mistake of his life.
This true story-inspired film is propelled by an outstanding female cast. Four friends take a wild trip to the Super Bowl to meet Tom Brady, a renowned player in the NFL.
A chaotic South African Christmas comedy. In Claire's final attempt at becoming an actress-director-writer, she uses her fiancé's family in a docu-film to launch her failed career.
Jason will do anything to have Nuella as his wife, but his actions and attitude will make her run away forever.
The high-octane action thriller places Kevin Dillon in a desperate race against time. An ex-military ops officer has one day to raise $2 million to save his kidnapped wife.
A magical canine story. A dog finds its purpose as it lives many lives through its bonds with a family, first with a young boy and then eventually with the boy's granddaughter.
A great cast drives this doggy adventure. A courageous dog travels hundreds of miles through the Colorado wilderness in search of it's owner.
For the first time in three years, the Moran family is spending Christmas together, but secrets and a meddling mother turn the holiday into chaos.
Sam's devotion to his daughter knows no bounds after losing his wife. However, tragedy strikes, stripping him of everything.
Florence Pugh and Morgan Freeman star in this poignant drama about a young woman whose life spirals after an awful incident. She finds comfort and strength in an unexpected relationship.
Daniel is caught in a love triangle between his materialistic ex-girlfriend and his intellectual new staff.
If you like Mr. & Mrs. Smith, you'll enjoy this action romance. A secret serial killer discovers that her husband is a contract killer, thus pitting them against each other. 2023
Geena Davis, Lori Petty and Tom Hanks run this movie. When the male baseball players go fight in World War II, two sisters join a team in the first all-women baseball league. 1992
Dora and her daughter endure a life of loneliness and poverty until they cross paths with George, whose presence promised to change their fortunes.
A gripping sci-fi thriller. It's 2041, Earth is in ecological collapse, and humanity's survival rests on settling new worlds. But the mission's AI assistant has a secret agenda.
A single mother finds love again with a successful business man, he accepts her son, but while the union gets stronger the whole story changes.
Caro is in an abusive relationship with Tompolo and refuse to leave the marriage. All hell broke loose when Tompolo attempts to sell their only daughter.
When Dorian's 16-year-old daughter, Princess, disappears, she's devastated. A year later, Princess's body is found with a note revealing a hidden grandson and the kidnapper's identity.
Raymond, once full of life, now struggles with despair and hopelessness after being confined to a wheelchair, contemplating the end of his life.
This rom-com, starring Lucy Hale, was inspired by a best-selling book. When Lucy's ex accuses her of being too inhibited, she sets out a racy to-do list to prove him wrong.
After several disappointments, Obinna finally finds a rich lady who believes in his dreams and ready to sponsor him, but things takes a different turn and everything changes.
A beautiful young couple go through the scariest moments of their lives, because of one silly mistake, only fate will deliver them from the dilemma.
A romantic film about a heartbroken actress who escapes to the Caribbean after a failed marriage. She meets a new love during her stay, but her past returns, complicating matters.
In this hilarious festive stand-up comedy, Mojak Lehoko, Schalk Bezuidenhout, Glen Biderman-Pam and Robby Collins joke about everything Christmas.
A Christmas special. Authentic African story telling at its best.
An Afrikaans-speaking man helps his elderly German neighbour in a time of need, despite a language barrier. In the process, he learns volumes about himself.
When Lisa marries the love of her life, Albert, she quickly realises that her in-laws are not as enamoured with her as he is. Maybe a colourful holiday will change their minds.
A light-hearted crime drama about a clique of swindlers running a seemingly well-organised syndicate that is put at risk when one of them develops feelings for the target.
An exciting animated adventure. An encounter with a Yeti, targeted by a rich man, sets teenage Yi and her two friends on an adventure to return the magical creature to his home. 2019
After a crime committed for SA's liberation struggle 30 years ago, three childhood friends are set free. They embark on a journey of self-discovery while facing their new realities.
A riveting, poignant and important documentary that gives women a voice and opens up the discussion regarding pregnancy and the choices that come with it.
A local Nigerian girl and a well - bred Caucasian American work together to fuse their different cultures, for the sake of love.
Comic genius Kevin Hart and Hollywood heartthrob Michael Ealy star in this chaotic comedy about two best friends battling to find and keep meaningful relationships.
Faithful is determined to do everything to ensure her parents stay together forever. However, her hopes for happiness are shattered when she discovers a secret.
Absolute obsession corrupts. The story of Ugo, who allows his obsession ruin the great love fate has for him
In a desperate quest to save the life of her dying mother, Sophie gets entangled with Jefferson, whose tempting offer puts her on a crossroad.
A group of filmmakers go to film on location in a forest, unaware that the grounds are a space for mystical rituals with one of them, a hungry killer out for blood

column2: Action Kommandant: The Untold Story Of The Revolutionary Freedom Fighter Ashley Kriel
column6: This moving and intimate documentary looks at the life and death of South African youth activist Ashley Kriel.
A woman of God is sent to a far  land to preach the gospel, but the powers that be will not allow her work to come alive.
After Timothy lost his wife to the cold hands of death, he decides to bring in another wife Ada Ogwa, but Ada has sinister plans.
A lady is a product of parental irresponsibility. Now her daughter is grown and still addicted to what she was addicted to.
Bola stands strong and fights for her heart when riches stands in the way of true love, this love leads to the death of her father Mr. Adeleke.
romantic comedy with funnywoman Tina Fey. A Princeton admissions officer has a choice to make when she meets an applicant- who could be the son she gave up for adoption.
Jesse Eisenberg, Kristen Stewart and Ryan Reynolds star in this quirky comedy. A witty student is forced to take a summer job. He hates it at first but soon meets others like him. 2009
Everything a lady she does works against her; little did she know that her mother sacrificed her to the shrine before her birth.
Metu as the wife to a prince is the solution to the quest of the Amankweke royal family, but the wives, Queen Margaret and Scholastica will do everything to make this fail.
The fourth film of the "After" franchise. A shocking truth about the couple's families emerges, leading Tessa and Hardin to realise they aren't as different from each other.
The fifth and final chapter of the After franchise. Hardin travels to Portugal in search of a woman he wronged in the past - and in hopes of finding himself.
Joe kidnaps his best friend because of money and marries his wife , now his spirit will never let Joe rest.
A school teacher and her lover fight to prove their love in a community of doubters. As they navigate their relationship, they encounter various challenges from different sources.
A dramatic second instalment of Anna Todd's book series. Tessa and Hardin's on-and-off relationship is again put to the test as a new love interest emerges for Tessa.
In this third film, Tessa and Hardin's bond faces another test when Tessa makes a life-changing decision and shocking revelations worsen things. Will they stay together?

column2: Against All Odds: The Alwyn Uys Story
column6: A documentary about Springbok hopeful Alwyn Uys and how he overcame a paralysing accident to inspire a nation with his swim from Robben Island to Eden on the Bay.
An officer of the Law is sent on a mission to spy on a Yahoo boy. But things begin to go sour when she drops everything and begins to act against everything her mission stands for.
Ugochi leaves her husband Ugwumba and abandons her only daughter Mirabel to marry Okoro, now she seeks forgiveness as her only daughter vows never to forgive her.
Adanma's mother dreams of her daughter marrying a wealthy man to lift their family out of poverty. However, Adanma falls in love with Emeka, who is also poor.
Prince Nnamdi discovers that the woman he has been dating belongs to the Osu caste. Despite this revelation, he intends to marry her, determined to face any challenges.
Two friends are fired from a mortuary for bad behavior. Instead of improving, they start their own business, only to land themselves in even bigger trouble.
Agiri is a name given to a man's concubine, in Otuocha every man has an Agiri. Kai-nene loves Osita with all her heart even in his ailment, but Osita finally falls in the hands of his Agiri.
After a fisherman is attacked and killed by a crocodile, his vindictive spirit stays behind to battle against a rival night runner's antics in order to avenge his unjust death.
Nelson lost his wife after giving birth to Amanda, he then decides to marry his wife's sister, Ezinne, and this brings about his downfall.
An epic animated adventure. A young hero and her Spirit Guides embark on a quest to save their home in the spectacular Amazon rainforest.
Benita relentlessly pursues Smith, her best friend's man. As blackmail and manipulation unfold when a compromising video surfaces, suspicions arise, pointing to Benita.
Odiase wins a wrestling contest and the king bless him bountifully with a land, including handing him his sister. Will it change Odiase?

Explore the true story of a Pentecostal minister accused of attempting to murder his wife with a rattlesnake. Featuring a local historian who spent his life studying the culture and folklore of the Pentecostal snake handlers.
When parents Janet and Sean leave for a much-needed weekend getaway, masked men bypass their high-tech home security system to hold their teen son hostage.

From stand-up to acting to directing, Albert Brooks has been a major force in American comedy since the 1960s. With testimonials from comedians, friends and Brooks himself, HBO explores the origins and evolution of Brooks' career.
An alien invasion action film. A female sniper on military leave encounters a hostile alien invasion and must save lives. 2023

column2: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now I Feel Kinda Left Out
column6: A sci-fi comedy. A teen girl helps her space-obsessed neighbour to find his parents, whom aliens might have abducted.
An angry alcoholic man is blamed for the kidnapping of local missing virgin girls after his return home from the military. Soon, his own kid is kidnapped

Kidnapped, assaulted, brutally stabbed and left for dead, Alison tells the story of the night that changed her life forever in this re-enactment. This is her tale of monsters, miracles, survival and newfound hope.
Everyone sees a lady differently, her actions and attitude make people see her as wicked and hot tempered.
A couple whose marriage is falling apart are sent back in time to when they were still attending college together, challenged to re-discover why they fell in love.
Tragedy strikes chief Kolade as he loses his wife and his only daughter. Things fall apart as Obiageli walks into their lives and transform them.
Daniel has been secretly in love with Tola since she joined Vanilla FM. Despite owning a car, he takes the staff bus to be close to her but struggles to ask her out.
Emilia frustrates David out of their relationship, just so she can be with another man. After Emeka moves on with Maria, Emilia shows up. Will he take her back?
In the face of deception and betrayal, a woman navigates the complexities of two romantic relationships while confronting her own secrets, leading to a journey of self-discovery.
Linda and Chucks pledge eternal love before Chucks leaves on a trip. But when Linda confronts Agbirigba, she loses her sanity. Now, Chucks must ensure her recovery.
Tega intends to take advantage of Simi's love for him and swindle her; but his ploy doesn't go as planned as he falls in love with his intended victim.
Meg vow that her son will only marry a women based on her recommendations, even if it means bringing calamity upon her own household just to stop her stubborn child.
Amina wants her family gathered for an annual Eid dinner, but nobody is as interested as they used to be, and she needs to figure out how to fix things to go back to how they used to be.
Brad Pitt and Marion Cotillard drive this film about love and espionage. A spy and a resistance fighter fall in love during a mission, but their relationship is tested by war.
Its all-out war in this festive comedy. It's the first Christmas since the death of a man's wife, and his whole dysfunctional family are gathering for the holidays. Chaos will ensue. 2016
When a young woman falls in love with the wrong man and ignores the one true love standing next to her. She experiences heartbreak.
Alomtjom is a story about friendship in a time of loneliness and about what it takes to be a true friend - for others and for yourself. Andries boasts he can befriend anyone.
Veteran actor Donald Sutherland stars in this horror thriller. Just as he has lost hope, Aidan fights to survive a zombie plague after he spots his attractive neighbour, Eva.
Bri is recently divorced and under house arrest due to her ex-husband's crimes, but when a stalker shows up, he seems to have control over her surroundings.
Ben Stiller and Jennifer Aniston star in this rom-com. A man, who hasn't taken a risk his entire life, decides it's time for a change after his bride cheats on him.

column2: Alternate Endings: Six New Ways To Die In America
column6: This emotional documentary explores various ways Americans find meaning and celebrate life as it ends.
It's 65-year-old Klara Cronje's first day at the retirement home. When Flip Kloppers introduces himself, she soon realises he's the father that abandoned her as a baby.
Faustian, a documentary filmmaker, embarks on a journey to uncover the truth behind his girlfriend's death.
A great mysterious warrior tired of the wars, retires to a cave near a village to settle and build a life for himself but met with resistance from the people of the village.
An action-packed Vietnam War thriller. A small outpost gets ambushed during the war, prompting a US Army squad to take the battle below ground on a high-stakes mission.
A political horror wrapped in satirical comedy. After children of undocumented immigrants are arrested, the detainees are given a chance to volunteer to care for the elderly. 2022
Oscar winner Denzel Washington stars in this crime driven biopic set in the 70s. A hard, honest cop works to take down a new heroin kingpin who has secured the underworld.
Sienna Miller gives a gripping performance in this emotional drama. A woman is left to raise her infant grandson following her teen daughter's disappearance.
A man waited for 21 years to realize he is not the biological father of his only child. How is  he supposed to react to this revelation?
A captivating romantic thriller set in Egypt. Two couples go on a romantic Nile cruise, but deception, treachery, lust and greed soon threaten to wreak havoc on all their lives.
An evil covenant comes from the foundation of a man that served his forefathers, after loosing his family to the cold hands of death, he must break it to have a better life.
Gerard Butler returns for the third instalment of this action-packed franchise. Mike Banning is on the run after he is framed for the attempted assassination of the President.
Caught between loyalty and newfound love, a man grapples with marrying his nurse or pursuing passion, facing a life-altering choice.
Holding on to anger is like drinking poison. It is impossible to feel anger without love but the consequences of one mastering this emotion is a danger to love.
Jack Nicholson and Adam Sandler face off in this crazy comedy. A man is wrongly sentenced to anger management treatment and is assigned to an eccentric therapist. 2003
In this thrilling movie, Kanayo.O.Kanayo kills his wife and sacrifice her to his coven.
A priest  is known for his outspokenness, he is faced with the challenge of standing up for his people through his prominent position.
Oscar-nominated actor Frank Langella stars in this hilarious comedy about a grumpy novelist who plots revenge when his wealthy neighbour builds a mansion next door. 2022
Beneath Anna Poliatova's striking beauty lies a secret that will unleash her indelible strength and skill to become one of the world's most feared government assassins.
We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope, who gets to laugh last when a couple is battling with the fury of a mother-in-law.
Jamie Foxx and young talent Quvenzhané Wallis star in this remake of a classic tale. The lives of a foster girl and a business tycoon are changed when he takes her in.
Ray learns dating a single mom doesn't entail playing daddy; instead, it offers the opportunity to become a valued member of a family and a positive role model for a child.
Mabel will do everything to frustrate her husband, but Harry's life is about to get more complicated as he gets entangled with Getrude.
Obinna breaks his wife's heart when he throws her and their daughters out because of another woman, Ifeoma. He gets her pregnant and the manipulation begins.
A young up-and-coming corporate lady becomes the target of a social media influencer after she rejects his advances
An all-star cast drives this adventure-filled animation. An ant who longs to be his own person fights the totalitarian society to inspire individuality. 1998
Sydney Sweeney and Glen Powell star in this steamy romcom. After a great first date, Bea and Ben's attraction turns cold, until they're reunited at a destination wedding.
The end of the world has arrived. Mana sits and waits for her son, a rescue worker, to come and save her. Then three other helpless people also come to seek shelter in the barn.
Take an inside look at the Apollo 11 mission to land on the moon led by commander Neil Armstrong and pilots Buzz Aldrin and Mike Collins.
Tom Hanks leads an all-star cast in this Oscar-winning film about three astronauts who desperately try to return to Earth after a routine space mission goes wrong.
The long-anticipated sequel to the 2018 release. Black Manta seeks revenge on Aquaman for his father's death.
Ice Cube stars as a man who falls in love, but he must win over the woman's two children. He gets to bond with them on a road trip, but the children are dead set against him. 2005
Anne Hathaway and Anthony Hopkins star in this family drama. A deeply personal coming-of-age story about the strength of family and the generational pursuit of the American Dream.
A fun-filled animated adventure. A bookish marmoset embarks on a wild adventure to travel around the planet in 80 days after accepting a challenge from a greedy frog.
A delightful romcom about a woman who left an arranged marriage and inheritance in India and began her own company. But when a problem threatens it, marriage is the solution. 2023
The greed of an elder brother makes him do the unthinkable to his younger brother in this emotional drama.
Mark Wahlberg stars in this heartwarming tale. An adventure racing team befriends a stray dog while competing in an endurance race in the Dominican Republic.

Marcus is abandoned by his fiancé – Emily, shortly after their engagement, when he loses his sight to injuries sustained in an accident.
A local bus driver sees a lady through school with his life savings, will she eventually stay with him?
After years of envy, Asa suffocates Magdalene with resentment. However, an unexpected twist brings them together as friends when Asa becomes Magdalene's unlikely savior.
Adapted from Mbongeni Ngema's Broadway production of Asinamali. On the prison yard on Robben Island, a man named Nelson Mandela told Msizi Dube Go and do it for all of us.
South African star Nomzamo Mbatha stars alongside Bruce Willis in this sci-fi action thriller. A widow takes on a mission to bring the man responsible for her husband's death to justice. 2023
Henry Golding and Noomi Rapace drive this action thriller. An assassin is given a contract to kill seven people around the world, only to discover the targets are also assassins.
A homeless woman saves the life of a wealthy CEO, and in an unusual moment of Christmas spirit, he invites her to recover in his luxury penthouse.
A starry, quirky and striking sci-fi comedy by Wes Anderson. Junior Stargazers and their parents attend a space cadet convention, only to have their worldview disrupted forever.
A newly married lawyer finds himself has to choose between losing his wife or taking on one of the most classified cases of a prisoner on a death sentence.

column2: At The Heart Of Gold: Inside The Usa Gymnastics Scandal
column6: This hard-hitting, unflinching documentary looks at the scandal of the national team doctor who abused young athletes for decades. 2019
Keira Knightley stars in this intricate tale of love and betrayal based on the best-selling novel. A childish misunderstanding leads to a devastating tragedy for one family.

A delightful comedy. Johnny, a lonely 30-year-old virgin, does maintenance at a law firm. He falls for Emily, who needs a nanny. Transformed into a woman by his sister, he becomes Emily's nanny, hoping to win her heart, but for how long?
Aunty Janet is married to two friends, little did she know that she is about to be played beyond her imagination.
Jessica Chastain leads a star-studded cast in this action thriller. An assassin working for a black ops organisation has to fight for her life when a job goes dangerously wrong.
Lanre tolerated Clara's excesses for years because of their loving daughter, but everything soon crumbles as she meets Jason who eventually ruins her life.
An influencer who is also married, lacks the basics of keeping her home and acting all perfect to the world on media. Reality hits her when she starts to lose everything.
Bigjo feels the heat from his fiancée, while Tony faces similar pressure from his mother, both pushing them towards desperate measures in pursuit of riches.
Gys' whole life spins out of control when he is forced to put down his boss' dog. A Silwerskermfees 2024 short film.
A young radio presenter living the ultimate bachelor lifestyle struggles to balance his public image and his ambition when he becomes the unlikely father to twins.
This adorable movie earned multiple Oscar nominations including for Best Picture. A farm piglet embarks on a career in sheepherding with some surprising and spectacular results.
Oscar winner George Miller (Happy Feet) directs this delightful sequel. The adorable pig returns and in this adventure he travels to the city in order to save the farm.
Baber is set in a macabre barbershop against the backdrop of the Cape Flats and its patriarchal values. Dônnie vanie Reevas enters the barbershop for a shave. Vikkah recognises him.
Thirty-four, without a man and health complications, Tasha Edwards has one wish, to have a baby before her thirty-fifth Birthday.

Dr Quincy Fortier's secret is out. Formerly a renowned Nevada fertility specialist, he has become best known for deceiving countless women struggling to conceive by using his own sperm - without their consent - to impregnate them.
Tina Fey and Amy Poehler bring their unique humour to this comedy about a woman who hires an unlikely surrogate to have her baby and must deal with the drama that follows.
A man who is deeply in love with another woman receives a gift of a child from a strange woman whom he met in an unplanned circumstance.
Years ago, BabyNa was impregnated and abandoned by Ejiofor in the village. Now, she discovers he is married to Isabella, but beneath Isabella's beauty lies a secret.
Emeka and Nwakaego live a fake life, deceiving each other in love, but the truth is about to come to the open as things start falling apart.
After the prince Leo kills Chief Mba's daughter, Ahanna, his driver goes to jail for him, and the palace plan his death in prison. After seven years Ahanna shows up.
Marisa Abela becomes the musical titan in this extraordinary story of Amy Winehouse's early rise to fame. Explore the many layers of the iconic artist and her tumultuous life.
An exciting sci-fi adventure. Two youngsters find a mysterious spacecraft that transports them into the dinosaurs' era, needing them to race against time to return home.
JIdekene jokingly nudges his mother to pick a wife for him, only to return home from overseas with a fiancée while the mother is already grooming a devoted damsel. 2023
A Sylvester Stallone crime thriller. After getting amnesia from a robbery gone wrong, a man is given a drug to stimulates memory. Now on the run, he fights the clock and his past.
Driven by greed, Ozioma will do anything to steal her sister's husband. After she succeeded, Nonyes' attitude changed, and long-hidden secrets are revealed.
Michael Bay's big action mixed with Will Smith and Martin Lawrence's chemistry makes for an epic buddy cop adventure. Two detectives fight to keep a witness to a murder alive. 1995
Will Smith and Martin Lawrence return for this pulsating sequel. This time, the two loose cannon cops are investigating the shipping of ecstasy into Florida.
The fourth entry in the epic buddy cop franchise. As always, Will Smith and Martin Lawrence find themselves in a precarious situation as they are framed and on the run.
A gripping, tense crime thriller starring Tyrese Gibson and Luke Hemsworth. Two illegal immigrants take a job digging a hole, only to discover that their employers are criminals.
A gold-digging teacher (Cameron Diaz) is dumped by her fiancé when he sees through her. She soon falls for a colleague (Justin Timberlake) but faces some stiff competition. 2011
A man is released from prison, makes his way back to his village, only to uncover many family secrets that promise to tear the community apart.
On Sochima and Omolara's wedding day, Alex is brought as a wedding gift to them, a son from Layefa that Sochima never knew he has.
Dave and Vivian resolve to seek a solution after suffering several miscarriages, but they soon learn a more profound truth.
Saartjie Botha's acclaimed play uses rugby as a metaphor for exploring issues of masculinity. This film version, like the original play, was directed by Jaco Brouwer.
Three online fraudsters get a taste of their own medicine when one of their victims sets out to unravel their schemes.
Josh Duhamel drives this outrageous heist film based on a true story. After escaping prison, a career criminal assumes a new identity in Canada and goes on a crime spree.
Ezenwa's father saved chief Oramulu during the civil war, now he will do everything to help Ezenwa, but his son Tom will never let this happen.
Based on true events, this British David vs Goliath film tells the story of a successful Burnley man who sets out to establish a community bank but encounters opposition. 2023
An aging matriarch aims to bring together her fractured, dysfunctional family over Eid-al-Fitr to break the news about her new romance.
Iwan Rheon (Ramsy Bolton in Game of Thrones) stars in this mystery thriller. Secrets emerge, and unsettling events unfold for four friends during a birthday celebration.
An all-star rendition of Mattel's Barbie doll. Barbie (Margot Robbie) and Ken (Ryan Gosling) embark on an epic adventure into the human world and discover shocking truths.
A middle-aged man is ready to marry his long-term girlfriend.  But he has to ensure his older sister is married too, so he places an advertisement in a newspaper.
A group of fake barristers take over a community and serve fake judgment to the citizens.
A wealthy young man, known for his generosity to friends, is tragically murdered and his wife and elder brother are being blamed for his death.
An action-packed WWII drama. A surgeon defends a hospital from invading Japanese forces in the Battle of Saipan. 2022
Dwayne Johnson and Zac Efron lose their shirts for this hilarious reboot of the 90s TV classic. A veteran lifeguard and a new recruit clash as they attempt to stop a criminal plot. 2017
Britain's beloved Mr Bean gets his first movie. More hilarious and bumbling antics ensue when Bean is dispatched to LA to deliver an extremely valuable painting. 1997
Based on a book of the same name by Jamie McGuire. Follow the life of a college freshman who tries to distance herself from her dark past while resisting her attraction to a bad boy.
After finding love, a woman faces the challenges of child bearing, which threatens her happiness.
After getting married for three years, the pressure of getting a child increase in her home as her mother in-law suggests surrogacy.
Jennifer's arrogant and stubborn demeanor is something everyone has to endure. It takes a turn for the worse when Jennifer decides to deceive her twin sister.
A supernatural thriller about demonic possession. While on a road trip, an evil entity creeps in and takes over Alex's body, leaving his fiancée to learn the disturbing truth.
This insightful documentary looks at the portrait of an artist. Theatre director Jack O'Brien sits with the legendary filmmaker, Mike Nichols to discuss his life and body of work.
A young lady falls in love with the son of an elite, but she must pass through some processes and the ultimate test before seen fit to marry into the family.
An intimate and intriguing documentary in the life of one of the world's richest men, Warren Buffett. Follow the evolution of a boy from Nebraska who became a world economic leader.
Scarlet, an affluent single mother who has sworn off love and marriage, finds herself captivated by her dashing new chauffeur, who also harbors secret affection for her.
If you love dogs then you'll enjoy Beethoven, a giant St. Bernard who lives with a doting family. Unfortunately, Beethoven has also attracted the attention of a sinister vet. 1992
The adventures of the lovable dog Beethoven continue, in the second instalment of this doggie franchise. Beethoven has to save his baby pups from a group of naughty children.
Hyman marries his wives when he was poor, but favor smiles on him as he makes unbelievable wealth. Now the entire family will kill themselves to get a pinch of his will.
